name: Jumper Boy
description:
Jumper Boy is a 2D platformer game where you'll need to guide the Boy through 21 levels (40 on full game release!) filled with dangers and against time itself all that while attempting to reach the flag that will lead you towards the next level.

There are many powerups in the Beta version, some beneficial and some will fake being that just to tempt your greediness, be careful.

Every 5 levels a password will be revealed to the player, make sure to write it somewhere as they are an invaluable asset towards getting through the game while keeping your sanity. However no one will stop you from attempting to speedrun the game.

If you like platformer games that have a little extra something to challenge you, then I hope you'll like Jumper Boy and I hope to hear your opinions about the game.

Good Luck and Have Fun. :)

Controls: Keyboard A/D to move Left/Right, Spacebar to jump and also to go through the cleared and death status during the game, this way you don't have to take your hand out of the keyboard to continue playing.
